h2_title: Where to Find the Yellow Wind Sage
content: The Keeness of Tiger can be gained by defeating the Tiger Vanguard in the Crouching Tiger Temple Region.
promot:

The content is as follows:
The Keeness of Tiger can be gained by defeating the Tiger Vanguard in the Crouching Tiger Temple Region.
